CustomField.description: Use this option to change the selected background color of choice based questions. Use hex or RGB color code as a value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Answer Choice Button Selected Color allows you to customize the background color of selected answer choices in choice-based questions. You can use either a hex color code (e.g., #RRGGBB) or an RGB color code (e.g., rgb(R, G, B)) as the value. By selecting a specific color, you can visually highlight the chosen answer options and provide a clear indication to participants of their selected choices.
CustomField.label: Answer Choice Button Selected Color
